desc: スパーク時、ダメージを２５％増加する

dictionary.lore: Long ago, there was a queen who fell in love with a strange type of flower. She took special care to make sure they had clean water and got just enough light. It's said that she would even speak kind words to them. Then on one warm day, the flowers came to hold a power of their own. Anyone who obtains one of these flowers is said to receive both the queen's kindness, and the power to unleash their innermost feelings with ease.

name: 王光の花

materials.name: 魔神斧ロード・マグレス
